item.description:
Let's get together before the Christmas Holiday and have a good time bowling, listening to the music and chatting with friends.

We will meet at the bowling alley, have them put on the Glow lights and have a good night of carefree fun.  Don't worry we are not there to Win...just to have fun, sometimes we even have people who have never bowled before or have never bowled Candlepin (only those "other" balls).

 

Just a few things to remember:

1.  Come with fun in mind

2.  Bring the Meetup Cell phone in case you get lost or are running late (978-304-2811)

3.  Bring your laughter and cheer

4.  If you haven't paid your dues for the upcoming year, please consider doing so at this event.

5.  Check the site before leaving for this event in case bad weather has caused us to cancel.

 

If we don't see you, may you have a very Merry Christmas /Happy Hanukkah

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the Snack Bar Table
item.name: Bowling with the Gang
